guideContainer.name: guide1
guideContainer.thankYouMessage: Thank you for submitting the form.

rootPanel.name: guideRootPanel

checkEligibility.jcr:title: Check Eligibility for Child Support
checkEligibility.name: checkEligibility

guidedropdownlist.jcr:title: Are you:
guidedropdownlist.longDescription:
Custodial parent - the parent the child lives with.

Non-custodial parent - a parent the child doesn’t live with.
guidedropdownlist.name: applicantStatus
guidedropdownlist.options: [The custodial parent=The custodial parent,A non-custodial parent=A non-custodial parent,A grandparent or other guardian=A grandparent or other guardian,A child over 12 years old=A child over 12 years old,None of the above=None of the above]
guidedropdownlist.title: Radio Button

page2panel.jcr:title: Eligibility Details
page2panel.name: page2panel

childLivingInGX.jcr:title: Does the child live in the state of GX?
childLivingInGX.name: childLivingInGX

guidedropdownlist_328136280.jcr:title: Do you live in the state of GX?
guidedropdownlist_328136280.name: selfLivingInGX
guidedropdownlist_328136280.title: Check box

caringParty.jcr:title: Who has the main day-to-day care of the child?
caringParty.name: caringParty
caringParty.options: [You=I have sole custody,The other party has sole custody=The other party has sole custody,The other party and I share custody=The other party and I share custody]

childagestatus.jcr:title: Is the child you are applying for:
childagestatus.name: childAgeStatus
childagestatus.options: [Under 16 years=Under 16 years,Under 20 years and in full-time education (High School or equivalent)=Under 20 years and in full-time education (High School or equivalent),Under 20 years and living with a parent who has registered for Child Support Services for them=Under 20 years and living with a parent who has registered for Child Support Services for them,None of the above=None of the above]
